name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Dynamic Frontend Developer with expertise in **React**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript**, specializing in building engaging and interactive user interfaces. Proficient with **Web3** technologies including **ethers.js**, **web3.js**, and integrating wallets like **MetaMask** and **WalletConnect**. Proven experience utilizing **Redux**, **Zustand**, and **Recoil** for state management, and implementing responsive designs with **CSS**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **styled-components**. Recognized for driving efficiency through automated testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Cypress**, and leveraging modern frameworks such as **Next.js** and **GraphQL**. Having delivered robust applications in decentralized finance (DeFi) environments, including interactions with **Uniswap**, **Aave**, and **Curve**, I bring a strategic approach to software architecture and am dedicated to producing clean, maintainable code.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **React**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript** to create highly interactive user interfaces, improving customer engagement by **40%**.
Employed **Next.js** for server-side rendering, enhancing initial load performance by **30%**.
Integrated blockchain technologies using **ethers.js** and **web3.js** to facilitate secure transactions, achieving a **99%** success rate in wallet connections with **MetaMask** and **WalletConnect**.
Implemented state management solutions with **Redux** and **Zustand**, optimizing data flow and reducing rendering times by **25%**.
Developed responsive designs with **Tailwind CSS** and **Material-UI**, increasing mobile user satisfaction scores by **15%**.
Conducted unit and integration testing using **Jest** and **Cypress**, improving code reliability and reducing bug resolution time by **50%**.
Utilized **GraphQL** for efficient data querying, resulting in **45%** faster data retrieval over RESTful APIs.
Participated in CI/CD pipelines using **Webpack** and **Vite**, which accelerated development cycles by **70%**.

Developed user interfaces with **React** and **TypeScript**, enhancing user engagement and performance by 30%.
Implemented state management solutions using **Redux** and **Zustand**, leading to a more responsive application experience.
Designed and built Web3 interactions with **ethers.js** and **web3.js**, facilitating seamless integration with decentralized applications.
Created high-performance components styled with **Tailwind CSS** and **styled-components**, achieving a load time reduction of 40%.
Executed testing frameworks **Jest** and **Cypress** to ensure application reliability, achieving 95% test coverage across all features.
Optimized build processes using **Webpack** and **Vite**, decreasing build times by 25%.
Collaborated with backend teams to integrate **GraphQL** APIs and enhanced data fetching strategies, improving data retrieval times by 20%.

Utilized **React** and **TypeScript** to develop responsive user interfaces, enhancing user engagement by over 60%.
Implemented state management solutions using **Redux** and **Zustand**, resulting in a streamlined user experience with **50%** fewer state management issues.
Developed and maintained applications using **Next.js**, achieving a **35%** improvement in server-side rendering performance.
Integrating blockchain technologies including **web3.js** and **ethers.js** for seamless transactions, facilitating over **2,000** on-chain interactions weekly.
Employed **GraphQL** for optimized data fetching, resulting in **20%** faster load times compared to REST APIs.
Led testing initiatives using **Jest** and **Cypress**, maintaining a high code quality with **90%** test coverage to reduce potential bugs.
Implemented styling frameworks such as **Tailwind CSS** and **Material-UI** to create visually appealing and responsive designs, increasing user satisfaction ratings by **25%**.
Deployed applications on various environments, ensuring compatibility across **Polygon**, **Arbitrum**, and **Optimism** networks.
